meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>rice</radical> <radical>fortune</radical> is <kanji>sticky</kanji>. Rice is sticky. So is your rice fortune. Your fortune of rice is sticky because it is made up entirely of sticky rice.
readingMnemonic: This rice is so <kanji>sticky</kanji> that you are able to sculpt <reading>nen</reading>doroids (ねん) from it. Your rice fortune is worth even more now that you are hand making limited edition nendoroids from it.
